author: cnbc.com
title: WPP PLC (“WPP”) Independent Investigation
text:
NEW YORK & LONDON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Board of WPP (NYSE:WPP) has appointed independent counsel to conduct an investigation in response to an allegation of personal misconduct against Sir Martin Sorrell, Chief Executive Officer of WPP. The investigation is ongoing. The allegations do not involve amounts which are material to WPP.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180403006640/en/
